entry.title: expz/alpbach-2012
entry.summary:
Live TeXed notes from 2012 Alpbach conference.

Alpbach 2012 Lectures (Organized by Zurich Graduate School of Mathematics)

Last update: 21:04 on 31.10.2012

To download files, click on the link, and then click on the button which says raw

PDF Files

Download the full pdf

Download the older version with continuous numbering (for reference).

LaTeX Files

These are input into the master file to compile the full pdf.

  • Preliminary Talk 1: Brent Doran++
  • Preliminary Talk 2: Sergey Gorchinskiy+
  • Talk 0: Introduction
  • Talk 1: Mario Huicochea and Roland Paulin+++
  • Talk 2: Fritz Hörmann+++
  • Talk 3: Alberto Vezzani+++
  • Talk 4: Thomas Weißschuh+++
  • Talk 5: Sergey Rybakov+++
  • Talk 6: Javier Fresán+
  • Talk 7: Rafael von Känel+++
  • Talk 8: Konrad Völkel+++
  • Talk 9: Martin Gallauer+++
  • Talk 10: Simon Pepin Lehalleur+++
  • Talk 11: Sergey Gorchinsky
  • Talk 12: Sergey Gorchinsky

Status markers

+ = Edited awaiting revision by speaker

++ = Revised by speaker awaiting further editing (e.g., bibliography, images)

+++ = Complete rough draft awaiting proof-reading

All files together

All at once in a zip file.

Remarks

If you take time to make improvements and mail them to me at jonathan.skowera@phys.ethz.ch, I'll incorporate them. There's no need to test that the TeX compiles. I'll take care of that.

If you would like to compile your talk apart from the others, you can use this test LaTeX file (just enter your filename on the \input{talk-2.tex} line). Note that compiling your talk apart from the others might cause warnings about broken references to other talks.
